creatives.name: vlab-mnm-hindi-mobile-credit
creatives.body: Aapki rai ke lie 300 INR ke mobile credit!
creatives.welcome_message: Hum yeh jaankar jeette hain ki aap kaise swasth rehte hain, aap 300 INR ke mobile credit prapt karake jeette hain!

creatives.name: vlab-mnm-hindi-mobile-credit
creatives.body: Aapki rai ke lie 300 INR ke mobile credit!
creatives.welcome_message: Hum yeh jaankar jeette hain ki aap kaise swasth rehte hain, aap 300 INR ke mobile credit prapt karake jeette hain! Yadi aapne pehle yeh survey mein bhaag le liya hai toh phir dubaara isse shuru na karien. Aisa karne par aap survey se bahar ho sakte hai aur aapko mobile credit prapt nhi hoga.
